Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Burton \Bur"ton\, n. [Cf. OE. & Prov. E. bort to press or indent anything.] (Naut.) A peculiar tackle, formed of two or more blocks, or pulleys, the weight being suspended to a hook block in the bight of the running part. [1913 Webster]

Burton n 1: English explorer who with John Speke was the first European to explore Lake Tanganyika (1821-1890) [syn: {Richard Burton}, {Sir Richard Burton}, {Sir Richard Francis Burton}] 2: Welsh film actor who often co-starred with Elizabeth Taylor (1925-1984) [syn: {Richard Burton}] 3: a strong dark English ale
